title: OPL Round 2 tipping recap!
body:
Check out this weeks tipping post: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/M67k5KJE-opl-round-3-tipping

Last week 17 summoners managed to pick all 8 matches correctly! How close were you to being on this list?
Congrats to:
Agent Mindstar
Riot Benji
Chief Sigils
Stevey Wonder
Carolion
SkumbagNostrebor
Zino

bunbun

replies.body: Can't believe I made the list! I was mostly guessing... :)
